name: Undying Flower
description:
Play the prototype now! “I will grow like a beautiful Flower, and if I fall, at least I will make a Flower Path for you.”

Fel found herself at a journey, to find the cause of her "death". Her spirit somehow remains on human world and ended up has a supernatural power. She can live the memory of a person in the past, fixing their lives so they don't have any regret in the future. But Why? While living someone's memory, she'll find some clues about herself. Will She find an explanation of her death? Will it reveal her destiny?

Undying Flower is a story-driven adventure game, where you have the power to see a person's memory, and live it! You'll fix peoples biggest regret by changing events in the past. And bit by bit as you advance in the story, you'll find clues about your death and what are you doing this for...

  • Cinematic storytelling with beautiful graphics
  • Unique gameplay mechanics
  • Touching story
  • Unique gameplay mechanics
  • Time travel and memory world
  • Multiple ending
